00051 /* Private types -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 typedef __PACKED_H struct _BM_FLAG_TYPEBIT
00053 {
00054   u8 Reserved  :6,
00055      Obsolete  :1,
00056      Direction :1;
00057 } __PACKED_F BOT_CBW_bmFlag_TypeBit;
00058 
00059 typedef __PACKED_H struct
00060 {
00061   u32 dCBWSignature;
00062   u32 dCBWTag;
00063   u32 dCBWDataTransferLength;
00064   BOT_CBW_bmFlag_TypeBit bmCBWFlags;
00065   u8  bCBWLUN;
00066   u8  bCBWCBLength;
00067   u8  CBWCB[16];
00068   u8  Reserved[33];
00069 } __PACKED_F BOT_CBW_TypeDef;
00070 
00071 typedef __PACKED_H struct
00072 {
00073   u32 dCSWSignature;
00074   u32 dCSWTag;
00075   u32 dCSWDataResidue;
00076   u8  bCSWStatus;
00077 } __PACKED_F BOT_CSW_TypeDef;
00078

00080 #if defined (__GNUC__)

00083 #endif

00088 #define _BOT_CSW_SIGNATURE          (0x53425355)
00089 #define _BOT_CBW_PACKET_LENGTH      (31)
00090 #define _BOT_CSW_PACKET_LENGTH      (13)
00091 
00092 #define _BOT_MAX_CB_LENGTH          (16)
00093 
00094 #if (BOT_LUN_NUM > 15)
00095 #error "The LUN must be 0 through 15."

00104 #define GET_MEDIA(lun)              (&gMediaInfo[lun])

00110 __ALIGN4 static BOT_CBW_TypeDef gCBW;
00111 __ALIGN4 static BOT_CSW_TypeDef gCSW;

00158 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00159   * @brief  BOT Initialization.
00160   * @retval None
00161   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00162 void BOT_Init(void)
00163 {
00164   s32 i;
00165 
00166   gCSW.dCSWSignature = _BOT_CSW_SIGNATURE;
00167 
00168   for (i = BOT_LUN_NUM - 1; i >= 0; i--)
00169   {
00170     SBC_Init(GET_MEDIA(i), i);
00171 
00172     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00173     /* Init Media if init function is not NULL. The media size will returned by init function               */
00174     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00175     if (gMediaInfo[i].Init != NULL)
00176     {
00177       gMediaInfo[i].Init(gMediaInfo[i].uId, &(gMediaInfo[i].Size));
00178     }
00179   }
00180 
00181   BOT_Reset();
00182 
00183   return;
00184 }
00185 
00186 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00187   * @brief  BOT Reset function.
00188   * @retval None
00189   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00190 void BOT_Reset(void)
00191 {
00192   extern USBDCore_TypeDef gUSBCore;
00193 
00194   gBOTState = BOT_STATE_IDLE;
00195   IS_WAIT_RESET_RECOVERY = FALSE;
00196 
00197   return;
00198 }
00199 
00200 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00201   * @brief  Get Maximum Logical Unit Number (LUN).
00202   * @retval guMaxLUN: Address of Maximum LUN
00203   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00204 uc8 *BOT_GetMaxLUNAddress(void)
00205 {
00206   return ((uc8 *)&guMaxLUN);
00207 }

00209 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00210   * @brief  BOT OUT Process.
00211   * @retval None
00212   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00213 void BOT_OUTProcess(void)
00214 {
00215   BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia = GET_MEDIA(gCBW.bCBWLUN);
00216 
00217   switch (gBOTState)
00218   {
00219     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00220     /* Decode and process CBW                                                                               */
00221     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00222     case BOT_STATE_IDLE:
00223     {
00224       _BOT_CBWProcess();
00225       break;
00226     }
00227     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00228     /* Data OUT process                                                                                     */
00229     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00230     case BOT_STATE_DATAOUT:
00231     {
00232 
00233       SBC_DataOUT(pMedia, gCBW.CBWCB);
00234       break;
00235     }
00236     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00237     /* BOT State machine out of sync, report Phase Error by CSW                                             */
00238     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00239     default:
00240     {
00241       SBC_UpdateSenseData(pMedia, SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_INVALID_FIELED_IN_COMMAND);
00242       BOT_ErrorHandler(BOT_STALL_BOTH, BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR);
00243       break;
00244     }
00245   }
00246 
00247   return;
00248 }
00249 
00250 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00251   * @brief  BOT IN process.
00252   * @retval None
00253   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00254 void BOT_INProcess(void)
00255 {
00256   BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia = GET_MEDIA(gCBW.bCBWLUN);
00257 
00258   switch (gBOTState)
00259   {
00260     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00261     /* Data IN process                                                                                      */
00262     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00263     case BOT_STATE_DATAIN:
00264     {
00265       SBC_DataIN(pMedia, gCBW.CBWCB);
00266       break;
00267     }
00268     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00269     /* Last Data IN, send CSW                                                                               */
00270     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00271     case BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST:
00272     {
00273       /* STALL IN Endpoint when last Data IN but Data Residue in CSW is not zero                            */
00274       if (gCSW.dCSWDataResidue != 0)
00275       {
00276         _BOT_StallEPT(BOT_STALL_IN);
00277       }
00278       BOT_SendCSW(BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED);
00279       break;
00280     }
00281     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00282     /* CSW is sent                                                                                          */
00283     /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00284     case BOT_STATE_SENDCSW:
00285     //case BOT_STATE_ERROR:
00286     {
00287       gBOTState = BOT_STATE_IDLE;
00288       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00289       /* Read OUT data with zero length to inform USB Device peripheral that process of CBW OUT             */
00290       /* data is finished. The USB Device will send ACK to Host when received next CBW OUT data             */
00291       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00292       USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData(BOT_OUT_EPT, (u32 *)NULL, USB_DISCARD_OUT_DATA);
00293       break;
00294     }
00295     default:
00296     {
00297       break;
00298     }
00299   }
00300 
00301   return;
00302 }
00303 
00304 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00305   * @brief  Check CBW Parameter is valid or not (Cass1 ~ Cass 13).
00306   * @param  DeviceDirection: Device expects data transfer direction.
00307   *         @arg BOT_DIR_OUT: Device expects OUT transfer (Host to Device)
00308   *         @arg BOT_DIR_IN: Device expects IN transfer (Device to Host)
00309   *         @arg BOT_DIR_NONE: Device expects No transfer
00310   * @param  uDeviceLength: Device expects data length.
00311   * @retval Result: TRUE for parameter is valid, FALSE for parameter is invalid.
00312   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00313 u32 BOT_CheckCBWParameter(BOT_Dir_Enum DeviceDirection, u32 uDeviceLength)
00314 {
00315   BOT_CSW_STATUS_Enum status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED;
00316   BOT_STALL_Enum direction;
00317   u32 Result;
00318 
00319   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld %dH%d %dD%d\r\n", __DBG_USBCount,
00320                                            gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction,
00321                                            gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength,
00322                                            DeviceDirection,
00323                                            uDeviceLength
00324                                            );
00325 
00326   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00327   /* Case 1 ~ 3                                                                                             */
00328   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00329   if (gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength == 0)
00330   {
00331     if (DeviceDirection == BOT_DIR_NONE)
00332     {
00333       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00334       /* Case 1 (Hn = Dn)                                                                                   */
00335       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00336       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE1\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00337       gCSW.dCSWDataResidue = 0;
00338     }
00339     else
00340     {
00341       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00342       /* Case 2 (Hn < Di) / Case 3 (Hn < Do)                                                                */
00343       /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00344       direction = BOT_STALL_NONE;
00345       status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR;
00346       __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE2, 3\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00347     }
00348   }
00349   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00350   /* Case 6 (Hi = Di) / Case 12 (Ho = Do)                                                                   */
00351   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00352   else if (gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength == uDeviceLength && gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction == DeviceDirection)
00353   {
00354     gBOTState = (DeviceDirection == BOT_DIR_IN) ? BOT_STATE_DATAIN : BOT_STATE_DATAOUT;
00355     __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE6, 12\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00356   }
00357   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00358   /* Case 4, 5, 7, 8                                                                                        */
00359   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00360   else if (gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction == BOT_DIR_IN)
00361   {
00362     switch (DeviceDirection)
00363     {
00364       case BOT_DIR_NONE:
00365       case BOT_DIR_IN:
00366       {
00367         if (gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength > uDeviceLength)
00368         {
00369           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00370           /* Case 4 (Hi > Dn) / Case 5 (Hi > Di)                                                            */
00371           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00372           direction = BOT_STALL_IN;
00373           status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED;
00374           gCSW.dCSWDataResidue = gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength - uDeviceLength;
00375           __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE4, 5\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00376         }
00377         else if (gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength < uDeviceLength)
00378         {
00379           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00380           /* Case 7 (Hi < Di)                                                                               */
00381           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00382           direction = BOT_STALL_IN;
00383           status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR;
00384           __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE7\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00385         }
00386         break;
00387       }
00388       case BOT_DIR_OUT:
00389       {
00390         /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00391         /* Case 8 (Hi <> Do)                                                                                */
00392         /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00393         direction = BOT_STALL_IN;
00394         status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR;
00395         __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE8\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00396         break;
00397       }
00398     }
00399   }
00400   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00401   /* Case 9, 10, 11, 13                                                                                     */
00402   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00403   else if (gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction == BOT_DIR_OUT)
00404   {
00405     switch (DeviceDirection)
00406     {
00407       case BOT_DIR_NONE:
00408       case BOT_DIR_OUT:
00409       {
00410         if (gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength > uDeviceLength)
00411         {
00412           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00413           /* Case 9 (Ho > Dn) / Case 11 (Ho > Do)                                                           */
00414           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00415           direction = BOT_STALL_OUT;
00416           status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED;
00417           gCSW.dCSWDataResidue = gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength - uDeviceLength;
00418           __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE9, 11\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00419         }
00420         else if (gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength < uDeviceLength)
00421         {
00422           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00423           /* Case 13 (Ho < Do)                                                                              */
00424           /*------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00425           direction = BOT_STALL_OUT;
00426           status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR;
00427           __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE13\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00428         }
00429         break;
00430       }
00431       case BOT_DIR_IN:
00432       {
00433         /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00434         /* Case 10 (Ho <> Di)                                                                               */
00435         /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00436         direction = BOT_STALL_OUT;
00437         status = BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR;
00438         __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CASE10\r\n", __DBG_USBCount);
00439         break;
00440       }
00441     }
00442   }
00443 
00444   if (status != BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED)
00445   {
00446     SBC_UpdateSenseData(GET_MEDIA(gCBW.bCBWLUN), SK_ILLEGAL_REQUEST, ASC_INVALID_FIELED_IN_COMMAND);
00447     BOT_ErrorHandler(direction, status);
00448     Result = FALSE;
00449   }
00450   else
00451   {
00452     Result = TRUE;
00453   }
00454 
00455   return Result;
00456 }
00457 
00458 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00459   * @brief  Write BOT IN data and update BOT State/CSW.
00460   * @param  pBuffer: Source buffer
00461   * @param  uLen: Length for write IN data
00462   * @param  status: BOT State after Write IN operation
00463   *         @arg BOT_STATE_DATAIN: The Data IN operation, BOT state machine will call to SBC read command
00464   *                                after IN Data transmission is finished.
00465   *         @arg BOT_STATE_DATAIN_LAST: The last Data IN operation, BOT state machine will send CSW after
00466   *                                     IN Data transmission is finished.
00467   * @retval None
00468   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00469 void BOT_WriteINData(u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLen, BOT_State_Enum status)
00470 {
00471   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld BulkIN\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, uLen);
00472   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)pBuffer, uLen);
00473 
00474   USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(BOT_IN_EPT, (u32 *)pBuffer, uLen);
00475 
00476   gBOTState = status;
00477   gCSW.dCSWDataResidue -= uLen;
00478 
00479   return;
00480 }
00481 
00482 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00483   * @brief  Read BOT OUT data and update CSW.
00484   * @param  pBuffer: Destination buffer
00485   * @param  uLen: Length for read OUT data
00486   * @retval None
00487   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00488 void BOT_ReadOUTData(u8 *pBuffer, u32 uLen)
00489 {
00490   gBOTState = BOT_STATE_DATAOUT;
00491 
00492   (uLen == USB_DISCARD_OUT_DATA) ? USBDCore_EPTReadOUTData(BOT_OUT_EPT, (u32 *)pBuffer, uLen) : USBDCore_EPTReadMemory(BOT_OUT_EPT, (u32 *)pBuffer, uLen);
00493 
00494   gCSW.dCSWDataResidue -= uLen;
00495 
00496   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld BulkOUT\t[%02d]\r\n", __DBG_USBCount, uLen);
00497   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)pBuffer, uLen);
00498 
00499   return;
00500 }
00501 
00502 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00503   * @brief  Send CSW.
00504   * @param  status: bCSWStatus field which define by BOT_CSW_STATUS_Enum
00505   *         @arg BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED: Command passed (Good status)
00506   *         @arg BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED: Command failed
00507   *         @arg BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR: Phase error
00508   * @retval None
00509   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00510 void BOT_SendCSW(BOT_CSW_STATUS_Enum status)
00511 {
00512   gCSW.bCSWStatus = status;
00513 
00514   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CSW \t[%x][%d][%d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, gCSW.dCSWTag, gCSW.dCSWDataResidue, gCSW.bCSWStatus);
00515   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)&gCSW, _BOT_CSW_PACKET_LENGTH);
00516 
00517   /* Wait until last STALL transmission is finished                                                         */
00518   USBDCore_EPTWaitSTALLSent(BOT_IN_EPT);
00519 
00520   gBOTState = BOT_STATE_SENDCSW;
00521 
00522   /* Cause the address-of-packed-member warning of GNU_ARM,                                                 */
00523   /* skip by #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Waddress-of-packed-member".                                   */
00524   USBDCore_EPTWriteINData(BOT_IN_EPT, (u32 *)&gCSW, _BOT_CSW_PACKET_LENGTH);
00525 
00526   return;
00527 }
00528 
00529 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00530   * @brief  BOT Error handler.
00531   * @param  StallEPT: Endpoint direction which want to STALL.
00532   *         @arg BOT_STALL_OUT: OUT Endpoint
00533   *         @arg BOT_STALL_IN: IN Endpoint
00534   *         @arg BOT_STALL_BOTH: Both IN and OUT endpoint
00535   *         @arg BOT_STALL_BYDIR: Depend on CBW direction field (gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction)
00536   * @param  CSWstatus: bCSWStatus field which define by BOT_CSW_STATUS_Enum
00537   *         @arg BOT_CSW_STATUS_PASSED: Command passed (Good status)
00538   *         @arg BOT_CSW_STATUS_FAILED: Command failed
00539   *         @arg BOT_CSW_STATUS_PHASEERR: Phase error
00540   * @retval None
00541   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00542 void BOT_ErrorHandler(BOT_STALL_Enum StallEPT, BOT_CSW_STATUS_Enum CSWstatus)
00543 {
00544   if (StallEPT == BOT_STALL_BYDIR)
00545   {
00546     StallEPT = (gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction == BOT_DIR_OUT) ? BOT_STALL_OUT : BOT_STALL_IN;
00547   }
00548   _BOT_StallEPT(StallEPT);
00549   BOT_SendCSW(CSWstatus);
00550 
00551   return;
00552 }
00553 
00554 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00555 
00556 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00557   * @brief  Decode and process CBW command.
00558   * @retval None
00559   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00560 static void _BOT_CBWProcess(void)
00561 {
00562   extern USBDCore_TypeDef gUSBCore;
00563   BOT_Media_TypeDef *pMedia;
00564 
00565   u32 uCBWLen;
00566 
00567   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00568   /* Read CBW OUT data from USB Buffer.                                                                     */
00569   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00570   /* Cause the address-of-packed-member warning of GNU_ARM,                                                 */
00571   /* skip by #pragma GCC diagnostic ignored "-Waddress-of-packed-member".                                   */
00572   uCBWLen = USBDCore_EPTReadMemory(BOT_OUT_EPT, (u32 *)&gCBW, BOT_MAX_PACKET_SIZE);
00573 
00574   __DBG_USBPrintf("%06ld CBW \t[%x][%d][%d][%d][%d]\r\n", ++__DBG_USBCount, gCBW.dCBWTag, gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength, gCBW.bmCBWFlags.Direction, gCBW.bCBWLUN, gCBW.bCBWCBLength);
00575   __DBG_USBDump((uc8 *)&gCBW, uCBWLen);
00576 
00577   gCSW.dCSWTag = gCBW.dCBWTag;
00578 
00579   pMedia = (gCBW.bCBWLUN < BOT_LUN_NUM) ? GET_MEDIA(gCBW.bCBWLUN) : NULL;
00580 
00581   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00582   /* Check CBW is valid or not                                                                              */
00583   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00584   if (gCBW.dCBWSignature != _BOT_CBW_SIGNATURE || uCBWLen != _BOT_CBW_PACKET_LENGTH)
00585   {
00586     _BOT_StallEPT(BOT_STALL_BOTH);
00587     IS_WAIT_RESET_RECOVERY = TRUE;
00588     gBOTState = BOT_STATE_ERROR;
00589     return;
00590   }
00591 
00592   gCSW.dCSWDataResidue = gCBW.dCBWDataTransferLength;
00593 
00594   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00595   /* Check CBW is meaningful or not                                                                         */
00596   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00597   if ((gCBW.bCBWLUN >= BOT_LUN_NUM) || (gCBW.bCBWCBLength < 1) || (gCBW.bCBWCBLength > _BOT_MAX_CB_LENGTH))
00598   {
00599     _BOT_StallEPT(BOT_STALL_BOTH);
00600     IS_WAIT_RESET_RECOVERY = TRUE;
00601     gBOTState = BOT_STATE_ERROR;
00602     return;
00603   }
00604 
00605   API_USB_EPTn_CLR_HALT(BOT_OUT_EPT);
00606   API_USB_EPTn_CLR_HALT(BOT_IN_EPT);
00607   SBC_CMDHandler(pMedia, (u8 *)gCBW.CBWCB);
00608 
00609   return;
00610 }
00611 
00612 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00613   * @brief  STALL specify endpoint.
00614   * @param  direction: Endpoint direction which want to STALL.
00615   *         @arg BOT_STALL_OUT: OUT Endpoint
00616   *         @arg BOT_STALL_IN: IN Endpoint
00617   *         @arg BOT_STALL_BOTH: Both IN and OUT endpoint
00618   *         @arg BOT_STALL_NONE: None
00619   * @retval None
00620   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00621 static void _BOT_StallEPT(BOT_STALL_Enum direction)
00622 {
00623   switch (direction)
00624   {
00625     case BOT_STALL_IN:
00626     {
00627       USBDCore_EPTSetSTALL(BOT_IN_EPT);
00628       break;
00629     }
00630     case BOT_STALL_OUT:
00631     {
00632       USBDCore_EPTSetSTALL(BOT_OUT_EPT);
00633       break;
00634     }
00635     case BOT_STALL_BOTH:
00636     {
00637       USBDCore_EPTSetSTALL(BOT_IN_EPT);
00638       USBDCore_EPTSetSTALL(BOT_OUT_EPT);
00639       break;
00640     }
00641     default:
00642     {
00643       break;
00644     }
00645   }
00646 
00647   return;
00648 }
00649 
00650 
00651 /**
00652   * @}
00653   */
00654 
00655 /**
00656   * @}
00657   */
00658 
00659 /**
00660   * @}
00661   */
